description: Episode of Series "Learning to be human". A young adolescent girl unable to cope with the relationship between her father and her new stepmother, runs away from home and is taken in by a woman farmer living nearby. During this time she comes to terms with her mother's death, her relationship with her stepmother and her own self-centred attitudes. Based on the book "Shelter from the wind" by Marion Dane Daver.
